name: kit
description: Kit is a platform that allows creators to automate tasks and developers to build apps for the Kit App Store.

tools.name: KIT_ADD_SUBSCRIBER_TO_FORM
tools.description: Tool to add a subscriber to a specific form by ID. Use after confirming form and subscriber IDs.

inputSchema.title: AddSubscriberToFormRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: The ID of the subscriber to add to the form.

form_id.title: Form Id
form_id.description: The ID of the form to which the subscriber will be added.

referrer.title: Referrer
referrer.description: The URL from which the subscriber was referred.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for adding an existing subscriber to a form by ID.

tools.name: KIT_CREATE_CUSTOM_FIELD
tools.description: Tool to create a new custom field for subscriber data. Use when you need to store extra attributes for subscribers.

inputSchema.title: CreateCustomFieldRequest

label.title: Label
label.description: The display label for the custom field (e.g., 'Favorite Color').

inputSchema.description: Request schema for creating a new custom field in Kit.

tools.name: KIT_CREATE_TAG
tools.description: Tool to create a new tag in the account. Use when you need a custom label to segment subscribers. Use after confirming tag uniqueness to avoid duplicates. Example: "Create a tag called 'VIP' for premium customers."

inputSchema.title: CreateTagRequest

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the tag to be created.

inputSchema.description: Request model for creating a new tag

tools.name: KIT_CREATE_WEBHOOK
tools.description: Tool to create a new webhook subscription. Use when you need subscriber or purchase event notifications.

inputSchema.title: CreateWebhookRequest

tag_id.title: Tag Id
tag_id.description: Tag ID required for 'subscriber.tag_add' or 'subscriber.tag_remove' events.

sequence_id.title: Sequence Id
sequence_id.description: Sequence ID required for 'subscriber.course_subscribe' or 'subscriber.course_complete' events.

initiator_value.title: Initiator Value
initiator_value.description: Initiator value (e.g., URL) required for 'subscriber.link_click' event.

target_url.title: Target Url
target_url.description: URL to receive webhook POST notifications.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for creating a new webhook in Kit.

tools.name: KIT_DELETE_BROADCAST
tools.description: Tool to delete a specific broadcast. Use when you need to permanently remove a broadcast by ID (after confirming the ID). Example prompt: "Delete broadcast with ID 123"

inputSchema.title: DeleteBroadcastRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: Unique identifier of the broadcast to delete

inputSchema.description: Request schema for deleting a broadcast.

tools.name: KIT_DELETE_CUSTOM_FIELD
tools.description: Tool to delete a specific custom field. Use after confirming the custom field ID is correct. Deletes the field permanently.

inputSchema.title: DeleteCustomFieldRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: Unique identifier of the custom field to delete

inputSchema.description: Request schema for deleting a custom field.

tools.name: KIT_DELETE_SUBSCRIBER
tools.description: Tool to delete (unsubscribe) a subscriber by ID. Use when you need to remove a subscriber from all sequences and forms after confirming the subscriber exists.

inputSchema.title: DeleteSubscriberRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: Unique identifier of the subscriber to delete

inputSchema.description: Request schema for deleting (unsubscribing) a subscriber.

tools.name: KIT_DELETE_TAG
tools.description: Tool to delete a tag by ID. Use when you need to remove obsolete or incorrect tags after confirming the tag exists.

inputSchema.title: DeleteTagRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: Unique identifier of the tag to delete

inputSchema.description: Request schema for deleting a tag.

tools.name: KIT_DELETE_WEBHOOK
tools.description: Tool to delete a webhook by ID. Use when you want to permanently remove a webhook after confirming its ID.

inputSchema.title: DeleteWebhookRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: Unique identifier of the webhook to delete

inputSchema.description: Request schema for deleting a webhook.

tools.name: KIT_GET_ACCOUNT
tools.description: Tool to retrieve current account information. Use after validating API key to fetch account ID, plan type, primary email, and timezone details.

inputSchema.title: GetAccountRequest
inputSchema.description: Request schema for retrieving current account information. No input parameters are required.

tools.name: KIT_GET_ACCOUNT_COLORS
tools.description: Tool to retrieve list of colors associated with the account. Use after confirming authentication to fetch account-specific color palette.

inputSchema.title: GetAccountColorsRequest
inputSchema.description: Request schema for retrieving account colors. No parameters required.

tools.name: KIT_GET_BROADCAST
tools.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific broadcast by ID. Use when you have a valid broadcast ID and need its metadata.

inputSchema.title: GetBroadcastRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: Unique identifier of the broadcast to retrieve

inputSchema.description: Request schema for retrieving a specific broadcast by ID.

tools.name: KIT_GET_BROADCAST_STATS
tools.description: Tool to retrieve statistics for a specific broadcast by ID. Use after a broadcast has been sent to monitor performance.

inputSchema.title: GetBroadcastStatsRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: Unique identifier of the broadcast to fetch statistics for

inputSchema.description: Request schema for retrieving statistics of a specific broadcast.

tools.name: KIT_GET_CREATOR_PROFILE
tools.description: Tool to retrieve the creator profile information for the account. Use when you need creator metadata (bio, avatar, social links) before publishing or customizing content.

inputSchema.title: GetCreatorProfileRequest
inputSchema.description: Request schema for retrieving creator profile. No parameters required.

tools.name: KIT_GET_EMAIL_STATS
tools.description: Tool to retrieve email statistics for the account. Use after confirming authentication to fetch metrics on emails (sent, opened, clicked) over the last 90 days.

inputSchema.title: GetEmailStatsRequest
inputSchema.description: Request schema for retrieving email statistics. No parameters required.

tools.name: KIT_LIST_BROADCASTS
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a paginated list of all broadcasts. Use when you need to enumerate or review broadcast summaries with cursor-based pagination.

inputSchema.title: ListBroadcastsRequest

after.title: After
after.description: Cursor for pagination; returns results after the specified cursor.

before.title: Before
before.description: Cursor for pagination; returns results before the specified cursor.

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: Number of results per page; must be between 1 and 500.

include_total_count.title: Include Total Count
include_total_count.description: If set to 'true', includes the total count of records in the response.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for listing broadcasts with optional pagination.

tools.name: KIT_LIST_CUSTOM_FIELDS
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a paginated list of custom fields. Use after confirming you need to enumerate or inspect all custom fields with cursor-based pagination.

inputSchema.title: ListCustomFieldsRequest

after.title: After
after.description: Cursor for pagination; returns results after the specified cursor.

before.title: Before
before.description: Cursor for pagination; returns results before the specified cursor.

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: Number of results per page; defaults to 500 if not specified.

include_total_count.title: Include Total Count
include_total_count.description: If set to 'true', includes the total count of records in the response.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for listing custom fields with optional pagination.

tools.name: KIT_LIST_FORMS
tools.description: Tool to list all forms. Use when you need to fetch forms with optional filters and pagination.

inputSchema.title: ListFormsRequest

after.title: After
after.description: Cursor for pagination; returns results after the specified cursor.

before.title: Before
before.description: Cursor for pagination; returns results before the specified cursor.

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: Number of forms to return per page.

include_total_count.title: Include Total Count
include_total_count.description: If set to 'true', includes the total count of forms in the response.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for listing forms with optional pagination and filters.

tools.name: KIT_LIST_SEGMENTS
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a paginated list of segments. Use when you need to enumerate segments with cursor-based pagination for further processing or display.

inputSchema.title: ListSegmentsRequest

after.title: After
after.description: Cursor for pagination; returns results after this cursor.

before.title: Before
before.description: Cursor for pagination; returns results before this cursor.

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: Number of segments to return per page (min 1).

include_total_count.title: Include Total Count
include_total_count.description: If set to 'true', includes the total count of segments in the response.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for listing segments with optional pagination.

tools.name: KIT_LIST_SEQUENCES
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a paginated list of all sequences. Use when you need to enumerate sequences with pagination for further processing or display.

inputSchema.title: ListSequencesRequest

after.title: After
after.description: Cursor for pagination; returns results after the specified cursor.

before.title: Before
before.description: Cursor for pagination; returns results before the specified cursor.

include_total_count.title: Include Total Count
include_total_count.description: If set to 'true', includes the total count in the pagination.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for listing sequences with optional pagination.

tools.name: KIT_LIST_SUBSCRIBERS
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a list of subscribers. Use when you need to fetch subscriber records with optional filtering, sorting, and pagination.

inputSchema.title: ListSubscribersRequest

after.title: After
after.description: Cursor for pagination; returns subscribers after this cursor.

before.title: Before
before.description: Cursor for pagination; returns subscribers before this cursor.

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: Number of subscribers to return per page (min 1).

sort_field.title: Sort Field
sort_field.description: Field by which to sort the subscribers.

sort_order.title: Sort Order
sort_order.description: Order in which to sort the results.

created_after.title: Created After
created_after.description: Filter to subscribers created after this date (YYYY-MM-DD).

email_address.title: Email Address
email_address.description: Exact email address to filter by.

updated_after.title: Updated After
updated_after.description: Filter to subscribers updated after this date (YYYY-MM-DD).

created_before.title: Created Before
created_before.description: Filter to subscribers created before this date (YYYY-MM-DD).

updated_before.title: Updated Before
updated_before.description: Filter to subscribers updated before this date (YYYY-MM-DD).

include_total_count.title: Include Total Count
include_total_count.description: If set to 'true', includes the total count of subscribers in the response.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for listing subscribers with optional filters, sorting, and pagination.

tools.name: KIT_LIST_SUBSCRIBERS_FOR_FORM
tools.description: Tool to retrieve subscribers for a specific form by ID. Use when you need to page or filter subscribers of a form.

inputSchema.title: ListSubscribersForFormRequest

after.title: After
after.description: Cursor for pagination; returns results after this cursor.

before.title: Before
before.description: Cursor for pagination; returns results before this cursor.

form_id.title: Form Id
form_id.description: ID of the form whose subscribers you want to retrieve.

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: Number of results to return per page (min 1).

added_after.title: Added After
added_after.description: Return subscribers added to the form after this date/time (ISO 8601).

added_before.title: Added Before
added_before.description: Return subscribers added to the form before this date/time (ISO 8601).

created_after.title: Created After
created_after.description: Return subscribers created after this date/time (ISO 8601).

created_before.title: Created Before
created_before.description: Return subscribers created before this date/time (ISO 8601).

include_total_count.title: Include Total Count
include_total_count.description: If 'true', includes the total count of subscribers in the response.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for listing subscribers of a specific form by ID with optional filters and pagination.

tools.name: KIT_LIST_TAGS
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a list of all tags. Use when you need a complete inventory of tags for the Kit account.

inputSchema.title: ListTagsRequest
inputSchema.description: Request schema for listing tags. No parameters are required.

tools.name: KIT_LIST_TAG_SUBSCRIBERS
tools.description: Tool to retrieve subscribers for a specific tag. Use after confirming the tag ID when you need to list subscribers associated with a tag.

inputSchema.title: ListTagSubscribersRequest

after.title: After
after.description: Cursor for pagination; returns subscribers after this cursor.

before.title: Before
before.description: Cursor for pagination; returns subscribers before this cursor.

tag_id.title: Tag Id
tag_id.description: Unique identifier of the tag to retrieve subscribers for

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: Number of subscribers to return per page (min 1).

tagged_after.title: Tagged After
tagged_after.description: Filter to subscribers tagged after this timestamp (ISO 8601).

created_after.title: Created After
created_after.description: Filter to subscribers created after this timestamp (ISO 8601).

tagged_before.title: Tagged Before
tagged_before.description: Filter to subscribers tagged before this timestamp (ISO 8601).

created_before.title: Created Before
created_before.description: Filter to subscribers created before this timestamp (ISO 8601).

include_total_count.title: Include Total Count
include_total_count.description: If set to 'true', includes total count of subscribers in the response.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for listing subscribers of a specific tag by ID.

tools.name: KIT_TAG_SUBSCRIBER
tools.description: Tool to associate a subscriber with a specific tag by ID. Use after confirming tag and subscriber IDs when tagging a subscriber.

inputSchema.title: TagSubscriberRequest

tag_id.title: Tag Id
tag_id.description: ID of the tag to assign

subscriber_id.title: Subscriber Id
subscriber_id.description: ID of the subscriber to tag

inputSchema.description: Request schema for tagging a subscriber by tag ID.

tools.name: KIT_TAG_SUBSCRIBER_BY_EMAIL
tools.description: Tool to associate a subscriber with a tag using an email address. Use when you have a tag ID and subscriber email ready. Use after confirming both resources exist.

inputSchema.title: TagSubscriberByEmailRequest

tag_id.title: Tag Id
tag_id.description: The ID of the tag to assign to the subscriber

inputSchema.description: Request schema for tagging a subscriber by email.

tools.name: KIT_UPDATE_ACCOUNT_COLORS
tools.description: Tool to update the list of colors for the account. Use when customizing your Kit account's color palette for broadcasts and templates.

inputSchema.title: UpdateAccountColorsRequest

colors.title: Colors
colors.description: List of hex color codes to set for the account (e.g., '#008000', '#FF0000').

inputSchema.description: Request schema for updating the account colors.

tools.name: KIT_UPDATE_CUSTOM_FIELD
tools.description: Tool to update a custom field's label. Use after listing or retrieving custom fields and confirming the field ID to rename.

inputSchema.title: UpdateCustomFieldRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: Unique identifier of the custom field to update

label.title: Label
label.description: New label for the custom field

inputSchema.description: Request schema for updating a specific custom field by ID.

tools.name: KIT_UPDATE_TAG
tools.description: Tool to update a tag's name by ID. Use after retrieving tag ID and confirming the new name.

inputSchema.title: UpdateTagRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: Unique identifier of the tag to update

inputSchema.description: Request schema for updating a tag by its ID.
